Reviews.Title: “First time in Wimbeldon hotel”
Reviews.Author: Bessum
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel nights attending family funeral sister elderly aunts treated sensitively due sad circumstances appointed suit immaculately clean memory mattress pillows comfortable breakfast freshly cooked quality ingredients unlimited tea coffee toast served sandra breath fresh air jay owner feel staying home guest house name mislead expecting lounge bar etc stay hotels definately rethinking future hope return happier times highly recommend wishing stay

Reviews.Title: “Excellent cosy home from home.”
Reviews.Author: Laura B
Reviews.Content: stayed wimbledon found wimbledon hotel homely feel standard excellent especially divine memory foam mattress pillows staff friendly accommodating criticism breakfast lot definitely stay highly recommend

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: SHVRome
Reviews.Content: calling boutique hotel expected lot apart renovations ongoing werent informed previously found disappointing effort soft furnishings looked cheap toiletry provided bathroom handsoap basic travellodges showergel provided shower awful alternating boiling freezing didnt drain fills water spare toilet roll floor covered hair floor sweeping yuck didnt try breakfast luckily werent caught cutoff time arrivals front door locked aware

Reviews.Title: “Unfortunately not the same under new management”
Reviews.Author: theplane
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel 6 times past 18 months found real gem prices fixed reasonable people running familyrun hotel warm helpful stay december 3rd week december found started wrong booking process calling getting prices person manning phone ranging night night unpleasant experience prices quoted matched hilton central london somewhat protesting inconsistent pricing booked days holiday hilton internet breakfast included days choice stay wimbledon fiancees family live close latenight christmas celebration evenings moved hotel unhappy basement smelled stale beer cold television watched standing sitting bed image completely distorted outside carpet dirty worn held walls peeling lighting akin cheap bar youd spend night wasnt accustomed hotel considering empty shock moving hilton prices straw hit camels manager chasing door morning running catch bus missed reason chasing key payment checking informed reservation 3 days hotel wasnt check unfortunately whereas recommend hotel fallen hotels avoid list

Reviews.Title: “small but comfortable family run B and B/guest house, good old fashioned service”
Reviews.Author: harraby
Reviews.Content: stayed wimbledon hotel family toddler staff pleasant helpful bed clean style decor en suite facilities ensuites ours compact fans provided air conditioning enjoyed nice breakfast dining morning childrens chairs provided bar facilities lifts access via narrow steep stairs upper floors
